price: 83. Mijn Heer! Geef mij wijsheid en voeg mij bij de rechtvaardigen;
arabic: رَبِّ هَبۡ لِي حُكۡمٗا وَأَلۡحِقۡنِي بِٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: rabbi hab lī ḥuk'man wa-alḥiq'nī bil-ṣāliḥīna
